column1: '''A Song of Aryador''' is a poem written by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] on [[12 September|September 12]]th
column2: [[1915]]. The poem bears upon the matter of the shadow-folk (referring to [[Elves]]) in ''Aryador'' ([[Gnomish]]: "land or place of shadow"). It was published in ''[[The Book of Lost Tales Part One]]''.<ref>{{LT1|Vn}}
